title: # 421 - David Wain & ME
description:
Today I chat remotely with David Wain. You may know David as the creator of Wet Hot American Summer, The State, Wanderlust, and more. We talk about meeting in Greece over 20 years ago, making cult classics, favorite sketches from “The State”, Paul Rudd, and much more! 

Check out Davids new show “Medical Police” streaming on Netflix now!

This Episode was brought to you by Hims. Get your first visit for free at http://www.forhims.com/Bertcast 

This episode was also brought to you by Fiverr. Get 10% off your first order by using the code "Bertcast" at http://www.fiverr.com     

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
